==Story==
{{VO/Story
|character           = {{ROOTPAGENAME}}
|language            = ja
|name                = 行秋

|vo_01_01_title      = 初めまして…
|vo_01_01_subtitle   = Hello
|vo_01_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Hello.ogg
|vo_01_01_tx         = 僕は行秋、ただの読書好きだ。不束者だが、君のために尽力するよ。せっかくこういうセリフを言えるんだ、ハハッ、悪くないね。
|vo_01_01_rm         = Boku wa Yukuaki, tada no dokusho zuki da. Futsutsuka mono daga, kimi no tame ni jinryoku suruyo. Sekkaku kouiu serifuwo ierunda, haha, waruku nai ne.
|vo_01_01_tl         = I'm Xingqiu, a mere bookworm. Though I still have a long way to go yet, I will give my all to assist you. It's not often I get to speak like this. Haha, not bad.

|vo_02_01_title      = 世間話・夜を独歩す
|vo_02_01_subtitle   = Chat: Night of Solitude
|vo_02_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Chat - Night of Solitude.ogg
|vo_02_01_tx         = 「明月や、夜を独歩す、かたわらに、悪龍罰すも、また一興」
|vo_02_01_rm         = "Meigetsuya, yoru wo dopposu, katawara ni, akuryuu bassu mo, mata ikkyou"
|vo_02_01_tl         = "Under the bright moon, walking the night in solitude. To punish an evil dragon along the way is yet another amusement." <ref group="TN •">Xingqiu appears to be reciting poetry: the 5-7-5-7-7 syllable structure is a feature of Japanese tanka poems.</ref>
|vo_02_02_title      = 世間話・文章
|vo_02_02_subtitle   = Chat: Literature
|vo_02_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Chat - Literature.ogg
|vo_02_02_tx         = 「衣へと、言の葉綴る、筆先は、童に帰り、思うがままに」
|vo_02_02_rm         = "Koromo he to, koto no ha tsuzuru, fudesaki wa, warabe ni kaeri, omou ga mama ni"
|vo_02_02_tl         = "The brush tip weaves words to the garment, taking one back to childhood where they are free to do as they wished."
|vo_02_03_title      = 世間話・暇を得る
|vo_02_03_subtitle   = Chat: Taking a Break
|vo_02_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Chat - Taking a Break.ogg
|vo_02_03_tx         = 「儚い人生の中で一瞬の暇を得た」というやつだ、ハハッ。
|vo_02_03_rm         = "Hakanai jinsei no naka de isshun no itoma wo eta" to yuu yatsuda, haha'.
|vo_02_03_tl         = I could say, "I have caught a moment of leisure in my transient life", haha.
|vo_02_04_title      = 世間話・読書
|vo_02_04_subtitle   = Chat: Reading
|vo_02_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Chat - Reading.ogg
|vo_02_04_tx         = ふむふむ、なるほど…えっ？次回お楽しみに？むっ…
|vo_02_04_rm         = Fumu fumu, naruhodo... E'? Jikai otanoshimi ni? Mu'...
|vo_02_04_tl         = Mm-hm, I see... Huh? Look forward to the next volume? Mm...
|vo_02_05_title      = 世間話・新刊
|vo_02_05_subtitle   = Chat: New Books
|vo_02_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} Chat - New Books.ogg
|vo_02_05_tx         = そろそろ「万文集舎」の新刊入荷日だな…ついでに行ってみないかい？
|vo_02_05_rm         = Sorosoro "Manbun Shuusha" no shinkan nyuukabi da na... Tsuide ni itte minai kai?
|vo_02_05_tl         = It should be about time the Wanwen Bookhouse releases a batch of new publications... Why don't we stop by along the way?

|vo_03_01_title      = 雨の日…
|vo_03_01_subtitle   = When It Rains
|vo_03_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} When It Rains.ogg
|vo_03_01_tx         = そういえば、うちの商会の錦の傘は日傘としても雨傘としても使えないみたいだ。唯一の使い道は壁に飾るだけだよ。
|vo_03_01_tl         = Come to think of it, it seems our guild's brocade umbrellas cannot be used to shield sun nor
rain. Its only purpose is to hang on the wall.
|vo_03_01_rm         = Sou ieba, uchi no shoukai no nishiki no kasa wa higasa toshite mo amagasa toshite mo tsukaenai mitai da. Yuiitsu no tsukaimichi wa kabe ni kazaru dake da yo.
|vo_03_02_title      = 雨上がり…
|vo_03_02_subtitle   = After the Rain
|vo_03_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} After the Rain.ogg
|vo_03_02_tx         = 晴れてよかった、でないと本がカビてしまう。
|vo_03_02_rm         = Harete yokatta, denai to hon ga kabite shimau.
|vo_03_02_tl         = Good thing it's sunny now, otherwise mould will start growing on the books.
|vo_03_03_title      = 雪の日…
|vo_03_03_subtitle   = When It Snows
|vo_03_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} When It Snows.ogg
|vo_03_03_tx         = こういう日にだけ、本屋より自宅のほうがいいと思うんだ。うちは暖をとるための炭がいくらでもあるけど、本屋は火気厳禁だからね。
|vo_03_03_rm         = Kouyuu hi ni dake, honya yori jitaku no hou ga ii to omou nda. Uchi wa dan wo toru tame no sumi ga ikura demo aru kedo, honya wa kaki genkin da kara ne.
|vo_03_03_tl         = Only on days like this do I prefer staying home rather than at the bookstore. At home, we have plenty of coal to keep warm, but fire is strictly prohibited in the bookstore.
|vo_03_04_title      = 晴れの日…
|vo_03_04_subtitle   = When the Sun Is Out
|vo_03_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} When the Sun Is Out.ogg
|vo_03_04_tx         = 修行…いや、読書日和だね。よせ、僕の顔に字なんて書いていない、じっと見ないでくれ。
|vo_03_04_rm         = Shugyou... Iya, dokusho-biyori da ne. Yose, boku no kao ni ji nante kaite inai, jitto minaide kure.
|vo_03_04_tl         = It's great weather for training... No, reading. Stop it, there's no writing on my face. Don't stare.

|vo_04_01_title      = おはよう…
|vo_04_01_subtitle   = Good Morning
|vo_04_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Morning.ogg
|vo_04_01_tx         = おはよう。朝の時間は貴重だから、自分の好きなことができたらいいな。
|vo_04_01_rm         = Ohayou. Asa no jikan wa kichou da kara, jibun no suki na koto ga dekitara ii na.
|vo_04_01_tl         = Good morning. The morning hours are precious, hopefully you can do what you like.
|vo_04_02_title      = こんにちは…
|vo_04_02_subtitle   = Good Afternoon
|vo_04_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Afternoon.ogg
|vo_04_02_tx         = 昼ごはんは米よりも、菓子のほうが食べたいな。書斎で食べれば、父上や兄上に知られることもない…ん？一緒に来るのか？うん…本に食べかすを落とさなければいいよ。
|vo_04_02_rm         = Hiru-gohan wa kome yori mo, kashi no hou ga tabetai na. Shosai de tabereba, chichi-ue ya ani-ue ni shirareru kotomo nai... N? Issho ni kuru no ka? Un... Hon ni tabekasu wo otosanakereba ii yo.
|vo_04_02_tl         = For lunch, I'd rather eat confectionery rather than rice. If we eat in the study, father and brother won't know... Hm? You're coming with me? Sure... As long as you don't get crumbs on the books.
|vo_04_03_title      = こんばんは…
|vo_04_03_subtitle   = Good Evening
|vo_04_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Evening.ogg
|vo_04_03_tx         = ホタルを捕って読書に使ってみたくないかい？むっ、僕の冗談を真に受けるなよ、目に悪いぞ。
|vo_04_03_rm         = Hotaru wo totte dokusho ni tsukatte mitaku nai kai? Mu', boku no joudan wo ma ni ukeru na yo. Me ni warui zo.
|vo_04_03_tl         = Don't you want to catch some fireflies and use them for reading? Mm, don't take my joke seriously. It's bad for your eyes.
|vo_04_04_title      = おやすみ…
|vo_04_04_subtitle   = Good Night
|vo_04_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Night.ogg
|vo_04_04_tx         = 明日もいつもの場所にいるよ。君が道に迷わない限り、きっと見つけるさ。
|vo_04_04_rm         = Ashita mo itsumo no basho ni iru yo. Kimi ga michi ni mayowanai kagiri, kitto mitsukeru sa.
|vo_04_04_tl         = I'll be there at the same place tomorrow too. You'll find me as long as you don't get lost.

|vo_05_01_title      = 行秋自身について…
|vo_05_01_subtitle   = About {character}
|vo_05_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About {character}.ogg
|vo_05_01_tx         = みんなの前で礼儀正しくしてるのは、みんなが僕のことを飛雲商会の次男坊だと思ってるから。君に素を見せてるのは、君が僕をそんな目で見てないからだろうね。
|vo_05_01_rm         = Minna no mae de reigi tadashiku shiteru no wa, minna ga boku no koto wo Hiun Shoukai no jinanbou da to omotteru kara. Kimi ni su wo miseteru no wa, kimi ga boku wo sonna me de mitenai kara darou ne.
|vo_05_01_tl         = I act politely around everyone because they consider me as the second son of the Feiyun Commerce Guild. I guess I'm showing you my genuine self because you don't look at me like that.

|vo_06_01_title      = 読書仲間について…
|vo_06_01_subtitle   = About Us: Reading Buddies
|vo_06_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Us - Reading Buddies.ogg
|vo_06_01_tx         = 君と僕は読書仲間だよね。ん？喧嘩？古華派？戦友？…ちょ、何を言ってるかな。二人の秘密だって言ったじゃないか！
|vo_06_01_rm         = Kimi to boku wa dokusho nakama da yo ne. N? Kenka? Koka-ha? Sen'yuu? ...Cho, nani wo itteru kana. Futari no himitsu datte itta janai ka!
|vo_06_01_tl         = You and I are book buddies, aren't we? Hm? Fighting? Guhua Clan? Comrades in arms? Hey, what are you saying? I told you this is our secret!
|vo_06_02_title      = 契りについて…
|vo_06_02_subtitle   = About Us: Swornship
|vo_06_02_friendship = 6
|vo_06_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Us - Swornship.ogg
|vo_06_02_tx         = 君と契りを結ぶ、さっそく絶雲の間の祭壇に行くぞ。だめだ、断るなんて許さない。君は僕の内情を知ってしまったし、僕がずっと隠してきた本当の自分を知ってしまったんだ…君を手放すわけにはいかない。君が…手を引かないと約束してくれるなら話は別だけど。
|vo_06_02_rm         = Kimi to chigiri wo musubu, sassoku Zetsu'un no Ma no saidan ni iku zo. Dame da, kotowaru nante yurusanai. Kimi wa boku no naijou wo shitte shimatta shi, boku ga zutto kakushite kita hontou no jibun wo shitte shimatta nda... Kimi wo tebanasu wake ni wa ikanai. Kimi ga... te wo hikanai to yakusoku shite kureru nara hanashi wa betsu dakedo.
|vo_06_02_tl         = We're going to the altar at Jueyun Karst to form a pact. No, I won't let you refuse. You know my secrets, and the real me I've been hiding forever... I can't let you go. Unless... you promise not to pull away.

|vo_07_01_title      = 「神の目」について・古書
|vo_07_01_subtitle   = About the Vision: Ancient Books
|vo_07_01_friendship = 3
|vo_07_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About the Vision - Ancient Books.ogg
|vo_07_01_tx         = 「神の目」に関する記載は少ないが、僕が集めた古書に特別な記述があるんだ。探してくるから待ってて。
|vo_07_01_rm         = "Kami no Me" ni kansuru kisai wa sukunai ga, boku ga atsumeta kosho ni tokubetsu na kijutsu ga aru nda. Sagashite kuru kara mattete.
|vo_07_01_tl         = There aren't many written records regarding Visions, but there's a special entry in the old texts I've collected. Hold on, I'll look for it.
|vo_07_02_title      = 「神の目」について・理解
|vo_07_02_subtitle   = About the Vision: Realization
|vo_07_02_friendship = 5
|vo_07_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} About the Vision - Realization.ogg
|vo_07_02_tx         = 本を読んで悟ったんだけど、槍術と剣術の本質は瞳術にある。うん、説明するのは少し難しい…もし、ちゃんと知りたいなら、僕と一緒に「王山庁」に行こう。先に言っておくけど、笑ってはいけないからね。
|vo_07_02_rm         = Hon wo yonde sattota nda kedo, soujutsu to kenjutsu no honshitsu wa doujitsu ni aru. Un, setsumei suruno wa sukoshi muzukashii... Moshi chanto shiritai nara, boku to issho ni "Ouzanchou" ni ikou. Saki ni itte oku kedo, waratte wa ikenai kara ne.
|vo_07_02_tl         = I've come to an epiphany that the essence of spearmanship and swordsmanship is in the art of the "eye". Mm, it's a little hard to explain... If you want to fully understand, let's go to Wangshan Hall. But I'll tell you this first, you're not allowed to laugh.
|vo_07_03_title      = シェアしたいこと…
|vo_07_03_subtitle   = Something to Share
|vo_07_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Something to Share.ogg
|vo_07_03_tx         = 璃月の行かないと損する場所？この質問は難しいなぁ…でも、なくなると悲しい場所なら…「万文集舎」は不動の一位で、「古華堂」もトップ10に入るかな。
|vo_07_03_rm         = Riiyue no ikanai to sonsuru basho? Kono shitsumon wa muzukashii naa... Demo, nakunaru to kanashii basho nara... "Manbun Shuusha" wa fudou no ichii de, "Koka-dou" mo toppu ten ni hairu ka na.
|vo_07_03_tl         = Must-see places in Liyue? That's a difficult question... But as far as places I would be sad to lose, the Wanwen Bookhouse is undeniably number one. The Guhua Sect would be in the top ten, too.
|vo_07_04_title      = 興味のあること…
|vo_07_04_subtitle   = Interesting Things
|vo_07_04_friendship = 4
|vo_07_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Interesting Things.ogg
|vo_07_04_tx         = 昔はウサギで、今は鹿かな。僕にとって、九死の時に見せる義侠心は全てを捨てる覚悟であって、鹿は九死から新たに生まれる希望だからね。もう一度会ってみたいな。
|vo_07_04_rm         = Mukashi wa usagi de, ima wa shika kana. Boku ni totte, kyuushi no toki ni miseru gikyou-shin wa subete wo suteru kakugo de atte, shika wa kyuushi kara arata ni umareru kibou dakara ne. Mou ichido attemitai na.
|vo_07_04_tl         = I would have said rabbits a while ago, but now I'm interested in deers. To me, chivalry shown in the face of death is the willingness to abandon all, and the deer is hope born anew in the face of death. I'd like to see it again.

|vo_08_01_title      = 北斗について…
|vo_08_01_subtitle   = About [[Beidou]]
|vo_08_01_friendship = 4
|vo_08_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Beidou.ogg
|vo_08_01_tx         = 北斗殿は僕の尊敬している方だ。でも、できれば僕のことを「坊や」って呼んだり、会う度に僕の髪をわしゃわしゃしたりするのはやめてほしいかな。
|vo_08_01_rm         = Hokuto-dono wa boku no sonkei shite iru kata da. Demo, dekireba boku no koto wo "bouya" tte yondari, autabi ni boku no kami wo washa-washa shitari suru no wa yamete hoshii kana.
|vo_08_01_tl         = Lady Beidou is someone I respect. But if possible, I wish she could stop calling me "Boy" and ruffling my hair every time we meet.

|vo_08_02_title      = 凝光について…
|vo_08_02_subtitle   = About [[Ningguang]]
|vo_08_02_friendship = 4
|vo_08_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Ningguang.ogg
|vo_08_02_tx         = 天権様は敬重しなくてはいけない相手だ、でないと父上や兄上に迷惑をかけるからね。ん？彼女本人？そうだな…うん、悪口はやめておこう。
|vo_08_02_rm         = Tenchuen-sama wa keichou shinakute wa ikanai aite da, denai to chichi-ue ya ani-ue ni meiwaku wo kakeru kara ne. N? Kanojo honnin? Sou da na... Un, warukuchi wa yamete okou.
|vo_08_02_tl         = I must respect her as the Tianquan, or else I will cause trouble for father and brother. Hm? What I think of her? Hmm... Yes, I must not speak ill of others.

|vo_08_03_title      = 重雲について…
|vo_08_03_subtitle   = About [[Chongyun]]
|vo_08_03_friendship = 4
|vo_08_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Chongyun.ogg
|vo_08_03_tx         = はあ、重雲のやつか、彼は僕の秘密を知ってるけど一緒に任務を行うとなると、気を付けないといけない。今の彼はまだ「武」にこだわっていて、「義侠」の心を理解してないからね。まだまだ鍛錬が必要だ…特に、辛いものを食べることに関してはね、ハハハ。
|vo_08_03_rm         = Haa, Chou'un no yatsu ka. Kare wa boku no himitsu wo shitteru kedo issho ni ninmu wo okonau to naru to, ki wo tsukenai to ikenai. Ima no kare wa mada "bu" ni kodawatte ite, "gikyou" no kokoro wo rikai shite inai kara ne. Madamada tanren ga hitsuyou da... Toku ni, karai mono wo taberu koto ni kanshite wa ne, hahaha.
|vo_08_03_tl         = Ah, that Chongyun. He knows my secret, but when it comes to doing quests together, one must be careful. Right now, he's still fixated on the art of battle and doesn't understand the spirit of chivalry. He still needs a lot of training yet... Especially when it comes to eating spicy things, hahaha.

|vo_08_04_title      = 雲菫について…
|vo_08_04_subtitle   = About [[Yun Jin]]
|vo_08_04_friendship = 4
|vo_08_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Yun Jin.ogg
|vo_08_04_tx         = 雲菫はね、気に入った飲み物を飲むと、芝居の創作意欲が上がるんだ。僕の寝台の下に茶葉入れが置いてあるのも、彼女がやる気をなくした時にあげるためなんだよ。そうすれば、僕はずっと侠客物語を楽しめる。
|vo_08_04_rm         = Unkin wa ne, ki ni itta nomimono wo nomu to, shibai no sousaku iyoku ga agaru nda. Boku no shindai no shita ni chabaire ga oite aru no mo, kanojo ga yaruki wo nakushita toki ni ageru tame na nda yo. Sousureba, boku wa zutto kyoukaku monogatari wo tanoshimeru.
|vo_08_04_tl         = When Yun Jin drinks a beverage she likes, her creative drive to write a play increases. I keep a jar of tea leaves under my bed, so I can give her some when she loses motivation. That way, I can always enjoy tales of chivalry.

|vo_08_05_title      = 胡桃について…
|vo_08_05_subtitle   = About [[Hu Tao]]
|vo_08_05_friendship = 4
|vo_08_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Hu Tao.ogg
|vo_08_05_tx         = あの小娘は今の往生堂の堂主だよ。ん？彼女をどう思ってるかって？…やり方に関しては噂話を聞いてもしょうがないよ。人を理解するには、相手の本当にほしいものを理解しなければいけないからね。
|vo_08_05_rm         = Ano komusume wa ima no Oujou-dou no doushu da yo. N? Kanojo wo dou omotteru ka tte? ...Yarikata ni kanshite wa uwasabanashi wo kiite mo shou ga nai yo. Hito wo rikai suru ni wa, aite no hontou ni hoshii mono wo rikai shinakereba ikenai kara ne.
|vo_08_05_tl         = That young lady is the current director of the Wangsheng Funeral Parlor. Hm? What I think of her? About how she does things, there's no point listening to gossip. To understand someone, you must understand what they truly desire.

|vo_08_06_title      = 七七について…
|vo_08_06_subtitle   = About [[Qiqi]]
|vo_08_06_friendship = 4
|vo_08_06_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Qiqi.ogg
|vo_08_06_tx         = 七七は謎だらけって感じだね。でも白朮先生がいると、彼女とは話せないんだ。そうだな、白朮先生が診察に出かける時を狙ってさ…
|vo_08_06_rm         = Nana wa nazodarake tte kanji da ne. Demo Byakujutsu-sensei ga iru to, kanojo to wa hanasenai nda. Sou da na, Byakujutsu-sensei ga shinsatsu ni dekakeru toki wo neratte sa...
|vo_08_06_tl         = Qiqi seems to be full of mysteries, isn't she? But when Doctor Baizhu is around, I can't have a conversation with her. Hmm, I could wait until Doctor Baizhu leaves for a consultation...

|vo_08_07_title      = 香菱について…
|vo_08_07_subtitle   = About [[Xiangling]]
|vo_08_07_friendship = 4
|vo_08_07_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Xiangling.ogg
|vo_08_07_tx         = 香菱に会った時は、彼女の表情を観察してみるといい。特に食材を手に入れたばかりの彼女が楽しそうに笑うほど、危ないんだ。試食を迫られたら…まあ、そういう時僕は重雲を身代わりするけどね。
|vo_08_07_rm         = Shanrin ni atta toki wa, kanojo no hyoujou wo kansatsu shite miru to ii. Toku ni shokuzai wo te ni ireta bakari no kanojo ga tanoshisou ni warau hodo, abunai nda. Shishoku wo semararetara... Maa, sou iu toki wa Chou'un wo migawari ni suru kedo ne.
|vo_08_07_tl         = When you meet Xiangling, you should observe her expression. Especially when she's just obtained ingredients. The more excitedly she laughs, the more dangerous it is. If she insists on you taste-testing... Well, in those cases, I let Chongyun take my place.

|vo_08_08_title      = 辛炎について…
|vo_08_08_subtitle   = About [[Xinyan]]
|vo_08_08_friendship = 4
|vo_08_08_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Xinyan.ogg
|vo_08_08_tx         = 辛炎は一体どこで演出してるんだ？チ虎岩から玉京台まで、どこもかしこも彼女から逃げられないじゃない…はあ、静かに本を読む時間はどんなに貴重か。
|vo_08_08_rm         = Shin'en wa ittai doko de enshutsu shiteru nda? Chikogan kara Gyokukeidai made, doko mo kashiko mo kanojo kara nigerarenai janai... Haa, shizukani hon wo yomu jikan wa donna ni kichou ka.
|vo_08_08_tl         = Just where is Xinyan staging her performances? From Chihu Rock to Yujing Palace, there's nowhere you can escape from her... Haa, how precious the time to read a book quietly is.

|vo_08_09_title      = アルベドについて…
|vo_08_09_subtitle   = About [[Albedo]]
|vo_08_09_friendship = 4
|vo_08_09_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Albedo.ogg
|vo_08_09_tx         = 次巻、次々巻、次々々巻の大事なシーンにどんな挿絵を入れるか全部考えておいたぞ！あっ、急いで文にして白亜先生に送らないと…
|vo_08_09_rm         = Jikan, jijikan, jijijikan no daiji-na shiin ni donna sashie wo ireru ka zenbu kangaete oita zo! A', isoide fumi ni shite Hakua-sensei ni okuranai to...
|vo_08_09_tl         = I've figured out what illustrations to insert into the next volume, and the next, and the one after that! Oh, I must hurry and write to Mr. Calx...

|vo_08_10_title      = 鍾離について…
|vo_08_10_subtitle   = About [[Zhongli]]
|vo_08_10_friendship = 4
|vo_08_10_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Zhongli.ogg
|vo_08_10_tx         = 父上と兄上がこの方を招待してるところは見たことがある。相手をとても敬っていたから、すごい人物だろうね。そういえば、彼は仙人の葬儀を担当すると聞いた、きっと物知りだと思う。彼の秘密を一緒に探ってみないかい？
|vo_08_10_rm         = Chichi-ue to ani-ue ga kono kata wo shoutai shiteru tokoro wa mitakoto ga aru. Aite wo totemo uyamatte ita kara, sugoi jinbutsu darou ne. Sou ieba, kare wa sennin no sougi wo tantou suru to kiita, kitto monoshiri da to omou. Kare no himitsu wo issho ni sagutte minai kai?
|vo_08_10_tl         = I've seen father and brother welcome this gentleman as a guest before. They regarded him with great respect, so he must be a distinguished figure. Come to think of it, I heard that he handles funerals for the adepti. I'm sure he's a very knowledgeable person. How about we investigate his secrets together?

|vo_08_11_title      = 申鶴について…
|vo_08_11_subtitle   = About [[Shenhe]]
|vo_08_11_friendship = 4
|vo_08_11_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Shenhe.ogg
|vo_08_11_tx         = 申鶴さんの僕を見る目つきは、少し恐ろしい感じがする。だから僕も、気軽には話しかけられない。ふむ…おかしいな、まさか無意識のうちに彼女…もしくは彼女の周りの人からの恨みを買ったのだろうか？
|vo_08_11_rm         = Shinkaku-san no boku wo miru metsuki wa, sukoshi osoroshii kanji ga suru. Dakara boku mo, kigaru ni wa hanashi kakerarenai. Fumu... okashii na, masaka muishiki no uchi ni kanojo... Moshiku wa kanojo no mawaru no hito kara urami wo katta no darou ka?
|vo_08_11_tl         = There's something frightening about the way Miss Shenhe looks at me. I can't talk to her casually. Hmm... this is odd. Could I have unintentionally incurred a grudge from her... or someone close to her?

|vo_08_12_title      = 夜蘭について…
|vo_08_12_subtitle   = About [[Yelan]]
|vo_08_12_friendship = 4
|vo_08_12_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Yelan.ogg
|vo_08_12_tx         = 「千の顔を持つ」という言葉を聞いたことはあるかい？夜蘭さんは、まさにそういった感じがする。あの人がうちを訪れた時、父上と兄上は礼をもって接し、向こうもまた礼をもって応えてくれた。まるで親切で落ち着きのあるお姉さんのようだったよ。けど、他のところで彼女を見かけた時、全然印象が違ったんだ。
|vo_08_12_rm         = "Sen no kao wo motsu" to iu kotoba wo kiita koto wa aru kai? Yeran-san wa masa ni sou itta kanji ga suru. Ano hito ga uchi wo otozureta toki, chichi-ue to ani-ue wa rei wo motte sesshi, mukou mo mata rei wo motte kotaete kureta. Maru de shinsetsu de ochitsuki no aru onee-san no you datta yo. Kedo, hoka no tokoro de kanojo wo mikaketa toki, zenzen inshou ga chigatta nda.
|vo_08_12_tl         = Have you heard of the phrase, "To have a thousand faces"? I feel that Miss Yelan is just like that. When she visited our home, father and brother treated her with courtesy, and she responded alike. She seemed like a kind and poised lady. But when I saw her elsewhere, she gave a completely different impression.

|vo_09_01_title      = 行秋を知る・1
|vo_09_01_subtitle   = More About {character}: I
|vo_09_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 01.ogg
|vo_09_01_tx         = 最近、調子はどうだい？時間があるなら、「万文集舎」に来てみるといいよ。
|vo_09_01_rm         = Saikin, choushi wa dou dai? Jikan ga aru nara, "Manbun Shuusha" ni kitemiru to ii yo.
|vo_09_01_tl         = How have you been doing lately? If you have the time, you should come by to Wanwen Bookhouse.
|vo_09_02_title      = 行秋を知る・2
|vo_09_02_subtitle   = More About {character}: II
|vo_09_02_friendship = 3
|vo_09_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 02.ogg
|vo_09_02_tx         = どうしていつもひとりで本を読むかって？学問を好むのって、悪いくせじゃないだろ。特別なことなんてないよ、うん、本当にないよ。
|vo_09_02_rm         = Doushite itsumo hitori de hon wo yomu ka tte? Gakumon wo konomu notte, warui kuse ja nai darou. Tokubetsu-na koto nante nai yo, un, hontou ni nai yo.
|vo_09_02_tl         = Why do I always read books alone? It's not a bad habit to be fond of academics, is it? It's nothing special. Yes, really.
|vo_09_03_title      = 行秋を知る・3
|vo_09_03_subtitle   = More About {character}: III
|vo_09_03_friendship = 4
|vo_09_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 03.ogg
|vo_09_03_tx         = 時間を空けておいてくれたのかい？ああ、僕もいつでも出発できるよ。本？ハハッ、いいんだ、本は帰ってからでも読めるけど、僕たちの助けを必要とする人たちを待たせるわけにはいかないからね。
|vo_09_03_rm         = Jikan wo akete oite kureta no kai? Aa, boku mo itsudemo shuppatsu dekiru yo. Hon? Haha, ii nda. Hon wa kaette kara demo yomeru kedo, boku-tachi no tasuke wo hitsuyou to suru hitotachi wo mataseru wake ni wa ikanai kara ne.
|vo_09_03_tl         = You made time for me? Yes, I'm ready to leave anytime. Books? Haha, it's fine. I can read books when I get back, but we can't leave those in need of our help waiting.
|vo_09_04_title      = 行秋を知る・4
|vo_09_04_subtitle   = More About {character}: IV
|vo_09_04_friendship = 5
|vo_09_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 04.ogg
|vo_09_04_tx         = いい案があるって？僕たちが前にしてきたことをモデルに、推理と武侠要素のある小説、『万文集事件簿』を書くって？うん、ハハハッ、いい案だね、でも却下、うん、却下だよ。
|vo_09_04_rm         = 
|vo_09_04_tl         = A good idea, you say? You want to write a mystery martial arts novel based on our previous deeds and call it "The Wanwen Case Files"? Mm, hahaha, that's a good idea. But I'm declining. Yes, I'm declining.
|vo_09_05_title      = 行秋を知る・5
|vo_09_05_subtitle   = More About {character}: V
|vo_09_05_friendship = 6
|vo_09_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 05.ogg
|vo_09_05_tx         = 「万の言葉を詩にして錦となる」なんて、僕もそんな評価がほしいな。この件は君にだけ教えるんだけど、実は僕も小説を書いてるんだ。い、今は見せられないよ。今後…今後本屋で見ることになるから。
|vo_09_05_rm         = "Yorozu no kotoba wo uta ni shite nishiki to naru" nante, boku mo sonna hyouka ga hoshii na. Kono ken wa kimi ni dake oshieru ndakedo, jitsu wa boku mo shusetsu wo kaiteiru nda. I, ima wa miserarenai yo. Kongo... kongo honya de miru koto ni naru kara.
|vo_09_05_tl         = "One who weaves ten thousand words into verse and turns it into brocade", I wish I could get such recogition. I'm only telling you about this, but I'm actually writing a novel too. I- I can't show it to you now. Later... You'll see it in the bookstore later.

|vo_10_01_title      = 行秋の趣味…
|vo_10_01_subtitle   = {character}'s Hobbies
|vo_10_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Hobbies.ogg
|vo_10_01_tx         = 僕の趣味は読書だよ、なんでも読むよ。ん？何ニヤニヤしてるんだい？むっ、あのことは僕たちの秘密だから、他言無用だよ。言ったらつまらないじゃないか。
|vo_10_01_rm         = Boku no shumi wa dokusho da yo, nandemo yomu yo. N? Nani niya-niya shiteru ndai? Mu', ano koto wa bokutachi no himitsu dakara, tagon muyou da yo. Ittara tsumaranai janai ka.
|vo_10_01_tl         = My hobby is reading, I'll read anything. Hm? Why are you smirking like that? Mm, that's our secret, so you have to keep it between us. It wouldn't be fun if you told people.
|vo_10_02_title      = 行秋の悩み…
|vo_10_02_subtitle   = {character}'s Troubles
|vo_10_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Troubles.ogg
|vo_10_02_tx         = 悩みか…うん、いつか兄上が家業を継いだら、僕はどうなるだろうね。この悩みのない生活もおそらく…あっ、肩書きの話じゃないんだ、そんなの気にしてないよ。兄上はぼーとしてるからね、僕の助けがないとやっていけない気がするんだ。
|vo_10_02_rm         = Nayami ka... Un, itsuka ani-ue ga kagyou wo tsuidara, boku wa dou naru darou ne. Kono nayami no nai seikatsu mo osoraku... A', katagaki no hanashi janai nda, sonna no ki ni shite nai yo. Ani-ue wa boo to shiteru kara ne, boku no tasuke ga nai to yatte ikenai ki ga suru nda.
|vo_10_02_tl         = My troubles... Yes, I wonder what will happen to me if brother takes over the family business someday. My carefree life will probably... Oh, I'm not talking about my status, I'm not bothered by that. Brother is absent-minded, so I feel like he wouldn't make it without my help.
|vo_10_03_title      = 好きな食べ物…
|vo_10_03_subtitle   = Favorite Food
|vo_10_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Favorite Food.ogg
|vo_10_03_tx         = 僕は菓子と月菜海鮮が好きだよ。うちはいつも薄味だからかな。
|vo_10_03_rm         = Boku wa kashi to Yue-sai kaisen ga suki da yo. Uchi wa itsumo usu-aji da kara na.
|vo_10_03_tl         = I like confectionery and Yue-style seafood. Our food at home tends to be lightly seasoned.
|vo_10_04_title      = 嫌いな食べ物…
|vo_10_04_subtitle   = Least Favorite Food
|vo_10_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Least Favorite Food.ogg
|vo_10_04_tx         = ニンジンは嫌いだよ。小さい頃、母上はよくニンジンを砕いて…これ以上はやめておこう。思い出すだけで、ちょっと…
|vo_10_04_rm         = Ninjin wa kirai da yo. Chiisai koro, haha-ue wa yoku ninjin wo kudaite... Kore ijou wa yamete okou. Omoidasu dake de, chotto...
|vo_10_04_tl         = I don't like carrots. When I was young, mother would often crush them, and... I'll stop there. Even remembering it, it's...

|vo_12_01_title      = 誕生日・祝福
|vo_12_01_subtitle   = Birthday: Wishing
|vo_12_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Birthday - Wishing.ogg
|vo_12_01_tx         = オ、オホン…ハッピーバースデートゥユー、ハッピーバースデートゥユー。
|vo_12_01_rm         = O, ohon... Happii baasudee tu yuu, happii baasudee tu yuu.
|vo_12_01_tl         = A, ahem... Happy birthday to you, happy birthday to you...
|vo_12_02_title      = 誕生日・習わし
|vo_12_02_subtitle   = Birthday: Customs
|vo_12_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Birthday - Customs.ogg
|vo_12_02_tx         = 本によると、天成石橋は上古戦争の時、岩神モラクスが投げた石槍が崩れた後にできたものだ。誕生日に橋の上を歩き、両側の海にモラを投げると、一年間安らかに過ごせるんだって…誕生日は年に一度だけだから、行きたいなら早く行きなよ…嘘じゃない、本当、本当だよ、早く行きなって。
|vo_12_02_rm         = Hon ni yoru to, tensei ishibashi wa jouko sensou no toki, ganshin Morakusu ga nageta ishiyari ga kuzureta ato ni dekita mono da. Tanjoubi ni hashi no ue wo aruki, ryougawa no umi ni Mora wo nageru to, ichi-nenkan yasuraka ni sugoseru nda tte... Tanjoubi wa nen ni ichido dake dakara, ikitai nara hayaku ikina yo... Uso janai, hontou, hontou da yo, hayaku ikinatte.
|vo_12_02_tl         = According to the books, Tiancheng's stone bridge was formed during the ancient wars, when the rock spear Geo Archon Morax threw crumbled. If you walk along the bridge and throw Mora into the sea on both sides, you can have a peaceful year... Your birthday only comes once a year, so if you want to go, you should hurry... It's not a lie, it's true, really, you should hurry and go.

|vo_13_01_title      = 突破した感想・起
|vo_13_01_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Intro
|vo_13_01_ascension  = 1
|vo_13_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension -  01.ogg
|vo_13_01_tx         = 力がなければ、僕の心にあるあの言葉も、紙に留まるだけかもしれないな。
|vo_13_01_rm         = Chikara ga nakereba, boku no kokoro ni aru ano kotoba mo, kami ni tomaru dake kamo shirenai na.
|vo_13_01_tl         = Without power, that word in my heart will perhaps remain only on paper.
|vo_13_02_title      = 突破した感想・承
|vo_13_02_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Building Up
|vo_13_02_ascension  = 2
|vo_13_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension -  02.ogg
|vo_13_02_tx         = 心に善悪を見分ける物差しがなければ、努力の方向を間違えてしまう。根本を忘れて暴力だけを追い求める俗人になる。
|vo_13_02_rm         = Kokoro ni zen'aku wo miwakeru monosashi ga nakereba, doryoku no houkou wo machigaete shimau. Konpon wo wasurete, bouryoku dake wo oimotomeru zokujin ni naru.
|vo_13_02_tl         = Without a way to discern right from wrong in one's heart, one will be misguided in their efforts. One will become a philistine who forgets the fundamentals and pursue solely violence.
|vo_13_03_title      = 突破した感想・転
|vo_13_03_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Climax
|vo_13_03_ascension  = 4
|vo_13_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension -  03.ogg
|vo_13_03_tx         = 僕が求むあの言葉は、璃月ではどこでも通じるわけではない。ここまできて、僕も十分に理解しているけどね。
|vo_13_03_rm         = Boku ga motomu ano kotoba wa, Riiyue de wa dokodemo tsuujiru wake de wa nai. Koko made kite, boku mo juubun ni rikai shite iru kedo ne.
|vo_13_03_tl         = The word I seek is not universally understood in Liyue. That I fully understand, after coming this far.
|vo_13_04_title      = 突破した感想・結
|vo_13_04_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Conclusion
|vo_13_04_ascension  = 6
|vo_13_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension -  04.ogg
|vo_13_04_tx         = 君が一緒にいてくれたおかげで、僕は満足できた&mdash;&mdash;武学に対しても、あの言葉の理解に対しても。ふう、もう「義侠」の心を隠さずとも平気かな。きっと父上も兄上も僕の「義侠心」を疑ったりしないはずだ。まぁ、目立たないよう行動することについてはまだ保留中だけど。
|vo_13_04_rm         = Kimi ga issho ni ite kureta okage de, boku wa manzoku dekita &mdash;&mdash; Bugaku ni tai shite mo, ano kotoba no rikai ni tai shite mo. Fuu, mou "gikyou" no kokoro wo kakusazu to mo heiki ka na. Kitto chichi-ue mo ani-ue mo boku no "gikyou-shin" wo utagattari shinai hazu da. Maa, medatanai you koudou suru koto ni tsuite wa mada horyuu-chu dakedo.
|vo_13_04_tl         = Thanks to you accompanying me, I was able to reach satisfaction &mdash; towards both martial arts and the understanding of that word. Phew, I think I no longer have to hide my spirit of chivalry anymore. Father and brother will surely have no doubts about my chivalric spirit. Well, in regards to acting inconspiciously, that's still on hold.
}}
